full_summary:
# 3D Printer and Material Cabinet Purchase Request

### Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) (Demande de propositions).

### Tender Title
The tender is for a 3D printer and material cabinet to satisfy the needs of the Department of National Defence (Ministère de la Défense nationale) at the Tactics school.

### Solicitation Number
WS3679301653

### Publication Date
2022-10-26

### Tender Closing Date
2022-11-25T14:00:00

### Amendment Details
This tender has undergone 4 amendments. The latest amendment date is 2022-11-14.

### Expected Contract Details
The expected start date of the contract is unknown, whilst the expected end date is 2023-03-31.

### Unspsc Details

- *44101725: Printer cabinets
- *45101511: Inkjet printer for commercial printing applications

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Notification
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on November 25, 2022, by 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.

### Points of Contact
For any inquiries or further information regarding the tender, please contact: Kristelle LeBlanc (SPAC/PSPC) at kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence, Tactics school, seeks to acquire a new 3D printer to replace their two Projet 860pro printers nearing the end of their useful life cycle.
